mapper.insert: INSERT INTO time(userId, imgUrl, content, longitude, latitude, location, createTime, updateTime, praiseNum, checkStatus, visible) VALUES (#{userId}, #{imgUrl}, #{content}, #{longitude}, #{latitude}, #{location} , #{createTime}, #{updateTime} , #{praiseNum}, #{checkStatus}, #{visible})
mapper.update: UPDATE time SET checkStatus = #{checkStatus}, visible = #{visible} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, userId, imgUrl, content, longitude, latitude, location, createTime, updateTime, praiseNum, checkStatus FROM time WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT imgUrl, content, location, createTime, updateTime, praiseNum FROM time WHERE userId = #{userId}
SELECT id, userId, imgUrl, content FROM time WHERE checkStatus = 0
SELECT id, userId, imgUrl, createTime, praiseNum FROM time WHERE visible = #{visible}
